body.p: Which of the following is not properly matched with its function?

multiple_choice.choice: Surfactant - protecting the alveoli from infection
Mucus - humidifying cells exposed to the air

feedback.p: Correct. The function of surfactant is to prevent the alveoli from collapsing due to the surface tension of water.
Incorrect. One of the functions of mucus is attract water and hydrate the surrounding cells. It also acts as a buffer and provides protection from microbes.
Incorrect. The main function of hemoglobin is to carry oxygen from the lungs to the tissues of the body.
